text: @realDonaldTrump "Coronavirus" doesn't care about imaginary lines mapped out. Someone please get this man a map with a sharpie, show him how all of this works. Use a globe as well. Of course we are having "Cluster Spots" for "now" until later, in which we need to be ready for. Listen to Cuomo!
